mapper.select: select contract_id,contract_serial, merchant_name,phone,first_date,username from dscwswtcw_contract where status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into dscwswtcw_contract ( contract_id , contract_serial , merchant_name , carport_number , purpose , plate , year_start , month_start , day_start , year_end , month_end , day_end , service_charge , total , upper , payment , pay_time , cash_deposit , expire , remark , first_agent , first_date , second_sign , second_agent , phone , second_date , username , status ) values ( #{contract_id ,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contract_serial ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchant_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carport_number ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purpose ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plate ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{service_charge ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upper ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay_time ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cash_deposit ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expire ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{first_agent ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{first_date ,jdbcType=DATE}, #{second_sign ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{second_agent ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{second_date ,jdbcType=DATE}, #{username ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status ,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dscwswtcw_contract SET contract_serial = #{contract_serial ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_name = #{merchant_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carport_number = #{carport_number ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate = #{plate ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_start = #{year_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_start = #{month_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day_start = #{day_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_end = #{year_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_end = #{month_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day_end = #{day_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_charge = #{service_charge ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper = #{upper ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment = #{payment ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{pay_time ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_deposit = #{cash_deposit ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expire = #{expire ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_agent = #{first_agent ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_date = #{first_date ,jdbcType=DATE}, second_sign = #{second_sign ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_agent = #{second_agent ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_date = #{second_date ,jdbcType=DATE}, username = #{username ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status ,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE contract_id = #{contract_id ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
